statements: DELETE FROM course_materials WHERE type = 'video' AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM course_materials WHERE title LIKE '%example%' AND file_url LIKE '%pdf%';
DELETE FROM lecture_slides WHERE topic = 'SQL Basics';
DELETE FROM lecture_slides WHERE slide_id IN (SELECT slide_id FROM course_assignments WHERE deadline < '2023-01-01');
DELETE FROM assignments WHERE course_id = 5 AND due_date < '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM readings WHERE author = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM Readings WHERE course_id = (SELECT course_id FROM Courses WHERE course_name = 'Database Management');
DELETE FROM assignments WHERE course_id = 5 AND due_date < '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM students WHERE course_id = 3 AND student_name = 'John Doe';
